title: Update and Distribute Community Rules
description: A property management company is updating the community rules for an apartment complex (e.g., new pool hours).

tasks.description: Draft the updated community rules and regulations document.
tasks.expected_outcome: A revised document with the new rule changes is created.

tasks.description: Distribute the updated rules to all current residents as required by law or the lease agreement.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new rules document is sent via email to all tenants in the complex.

tasks.description: Update the new resident onboarding package to include the new version of the rules.
tasks.expected_outcome: The template for new lease packages is updated with the latest rules document.
